/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The sky is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly in the top right corner, casting a warm glow over the entire scene.

On either side of the street, there are buildings painted in vibrant shades of red and yellow, their colors contrasting beautifully with the blue sky. The street itself is lined with trees, their green leaves adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Power lines crisscross above the street, a common sight in many cities.

A pink car is seen driving down the street, adding a pop of color to the scene. On the sidewalk, a person can be seen walking, going about their day. The image beautifully encapsulates a typical day in Beijing, with its blend of urban life and natural beauty.
